00014 #ifndef B3_GPU_PARALLEL_LINEAR_BVH_BROADPHASE_H
00015 #define B3_GPU_PARALLEL_LINEAR_BVH_BROADPHASE_H
00016 
00017 #include "Bullet3OpenCL/BroadphaseCollision/b3GpuBroadphaseInterface.h"
00018 
00019 #include "b3GpuParallelLinearBvh.h"
00020 
00021 class b3GpuParallelLinearBvhBroadphase : public b3GpuBroadphaseInterface
00022 {
00023         b3GpuParallelLinearBvh m_plbvh;
00024         
00025         b3OpenCLArray<b3Int4> m_overlappingPairsGpu;
00026         
00027         b3OpenCLArray<b3SapAabb> m_aabbsGpu;
00028         b3OpenCLArray<int> m_smallAabbsMappingGpu;
00029         b3OpenCLArray<int> m_largeAabbsMappingGpu;
00030         
00031         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3SapAabb> m_aabbsCpu;
00032         b3AlignedObjectArray<int> m_smallAabbsMappingCpu;
00033         b3AlignedObjectArray<int> m_largeAabbsMappingCpu;
00034         
00035 public:
00036         b3GpuParallelLinearBvhBroadphase(cl_context context, cl_device_id device, cl_command_queue queue);
00037         virtual ~b3GpuParallelLinearBvhBroadphase() {}
00038 
00039         virtual void createProxy(const b3Vector3& aabbMin, const b3Vector3& aabbMax, int userPtr,  int collisionFilterGroup,  int collisionFilterMask);
00040         virtual void createLargeProxy(const b3Vector3& aabbMin, const b3Vector3& aabbMax, int userPtr,  int collisionFilterGroup,  int collisionFilterMask);
00041         
00042         virtual void calculateOverlappingPairs(int maxPairs);
00043         virtual void calculateOverlappingPairsHost(int maxPairs);
00044 
00045         //call writeAabbsToGpu after done making all changes (createProxy etc)
00046         virtual void writeAabbsToGpu();
00047         
00048         virtual int     getNumOverlap() { return m_overlappingPairsGpu.size(); }
00049         virtual cl_mem getOverlappingPairBuffer() { return m_overlappingPairsGpu.getBufferCL(); }
00050 
00051         virtual cl_mem getAabbBufferWS() { return m_aabbsGpu.getBufferCL(); }
00052         virtual b3OpenCLArray<b3SapAabb>& getAllAabbsGPU() { return m_aabbsGpu; }
00053         
00054         virtual b3OpenCLArray<b3Int4>& getOverlappingPairsGPU() { return m_overlappingPairsGpu; }
00055         virtual b3OpenCLArray<int>& getSmallAabbIndicesGPU() { return m_smallAabbsMappingGpu; }
00056         virtual b3OpenCLArray<int>& getLargeAabbIndicesGPU() { return m_largeAabbsMappingGpu; }
00057         
00058         virtual b3AlignedObjectArray<b3SapAabb>& getAllAabbsCPU() { return m_aabbsCpu; }
00059         
00060         static b3GpuBroadphaseInterface* CreateFunc(cl_context context, cl_device_id device, cl_command_queue queue)
00061         {
00062                 return new b3GpuParallelLinearBvhBroadphase(context, device, queue);
00063         }
00064 };
